titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on formulations of Clodinafop-propargyl.
To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on formulations of Clodinafop-propargyl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend, through December 31, 2011, the duty on formulations of Clodinafop-propargyl.
